article:
A young man who lived in London was in love with a beautiful girl. Soon she became his fiancee . The man was very poor while the girl was rich. The young man wanted to give her a   _  on
her birthday. He wanted to buy something  _  for her, but he
had no  _  how to do it as he had very little  _  . The next morning he went to a shop. There were many fine things
there: rings, gold watches, diamonds but all these things were  too expensive  . There was one thing he could not take his eyes off. It was a beautiful
vase. That would be a wonderful present for  his fiancee  .  He
had been looking at the vase for half an hour when the manager asked what had
happened to him.
The young man told him everything. The manager felt   _  for him and decided
to help him. A brilliant idea  _  him. The manager pointed to
the corner of the shop. To his great  _  , the young man saw
a vase  _  into many pieces. The manager said, "I can help
you. I shall order my servant to  _  it and take it to your fiancee
.When he enters the room, he will  _  it."
On the birthday of his fiancee the young man was very  _  . Everything
happened as he had  _  . The servant brought in the case, and
as he entered the room, he dropped it. There was  _  on
everybody's face. When the vase was unwrapped, the guests saw that each piece
was packed separately.
